sample_001.prompt: A realistic, black and white video of Albert Einstein in his prime. He has his iconic wild, light-colored hair and a well-groomed mustache. He is wearing a classic early 20th-century three-piece suit, including a vest, jacket, and tie. He is standing in front of a dark chalkboard with a large, roughly drawn circle on it. He is holding a small piece of chalk in his right hand. He is looking directly at the camera and speaking with a thoughtful, engaging expression. Professional studio lighting of the period.

sample_000.prompt: A high-definition, dynamic close-up and medium shot video of a charismatic male instructor in his late 20s to early 30s. He has short, neat dark blonde/light brown hair, light stubble, and expressive light eyes. He is wearing a fitted charcoal grey V-neck sweater and blue jeans. He is seated, holding a sleek black electric guitar resting on his right leg. He is speaking directly to the camera with a warm, engaging, and professional tone. His mouth movements are synchronized perfectly with speech. His hands are actively but naturally gesturing. He frequently makes direct eye contact with a focused, teaching gaze, occasionally blinking naturally. His facial expression shifts subtly between focused concentration and a relaxed, encouraging smile. Lighting is soft, professional studio key and fill light, creating depth without harsh shadows. Clean, minimalist white-to-light-grey gradient background. Cinematic 4K quality.

sample_005.prompt: A blonde-haired, blue-eyed woman is speaking. The camera slowly pulls back to reveal a street view.

sample_002.prompt: Summer beach vacation style, a white cat wearing sunglasses sits on a surfboard.
